mapper.insert: insert into users ( user_num, user_id, password, name, birth, gender, email, phone, user_role, address, address_sub) values( users_seq.nextval, #{userId}, #{password}, #{name}, #{birth}, #{gender}, #{email}, #{phone}, 'r01', #{address}, #{addressSub} )
mapper.select: select name, email, phone, status, user_id from users where name = #{name} and email = #{email} and phone = #{phone} and status = 'Y'
select user_id, name, email, phone, status, password from users where user_id = #{userId} and name = #{name} and email = #{email} and phone = #{phone} and status = 'Y'
select user_num, user_id, password, name, birth, gender, email, phone, status, user_role, udate, address, address_sub, image From users where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: update users set name = #{name}, birth = #{birth}, gender = #{gender}, email = #{email}, phone = #{phone}, address = #{address}, address_sub = #{addressSub}, image = #{image} where user_id = #{userId}
